title: The advantages and challenges of “big data”: Insights from the 14 billion word iWeb corpus
abstract: The iWeb corpus contains nearly 14 billion words from 22 million web pages, and it has been designed in a way that allows users to quickly and easily...

tldr.text: The iWeb corpus contains nearly 14 billion words from 22 million web pages, and it has been designed in a way that allows users to quickly and easily access the text within the corpus.
